Dear mother 
It is 8:08 am on the #snowday and the housebound children have turned feral. One is kicking a pot across the hardwood floor. The other is trying to break the closet door. I have deployed a card matching game on the floor. I fear it won’t hold them long.

text: But imagine, what if a publisher's CMS popped up a message that was like "Hey, you still have one very, very important last step to finish here before you consider yourself "done" with this story you just published. Would you like to go do it?" 3/fin
author: michaelroston

text: Obviously this wouldn't solve all problems with writers that go unpaid. If a company's invoicing system sucks -- and many do -- it wouldn't ensure quick payment. Also, many who end up hitting "publish" on a story in a CMS aren't involved in assigning/editing/paying for a story 2/
author: michaelroston

text: There's a real case to be made for a mandate requiring that all CMS's include a feature that routes you straight to invoicing for freelancers the moment you hit "publish" on a story 1/
